import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import '../index.css' import '../styles/personalInfo.scss' import buttonIcon from '../images/buttonIcon.png' const PersonalInformation = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [massage, setMassage] = useState('') const handleChange = event => { setMassage(event.target.value); }; const handleClick = event => { event.preventDefault(); let inputName = document.getElementById('name') if(massage.trim().length <=2){ inputName.classList.remove('inputSuccsess') inputName.classList.add('inputError'); }else{ inputName.classList.remove('inputError'); inputName.classList.add('inputSuccsess') } let inputEmail = document.getElementById('email') console.log(inputEmail.indexOf('gigi')) } return (
